column4: Hi there. I need some help creating a boot disk. I am running a PowerPC G4 Mac. I have burn disks but I don't I'm doing it right cause it my Mac doesn't boor from it.
Lot of folks here... Is there a better place to get boot disk help?
I saw that but I cannot help you with this. Please be patient and repeat your question in about 10 minutes or so, there are not too many with mac experience...
